dialogues.text: I see you have found my little hideout. I must say I am impressed.
I heard someone was investigating the pollution, so I assume that must be you. I did not expect you here so fast, to be honest.
Alas, I'm afraid I can't stay here for chit-chat. I have to attend other business. There is much to do.
You probably have lots of questions right now, he he. They will have to wait.
